name: Trick or Treat II
description:
Controls:

Another game, made with the shockingly good pocket-platformer from l0bster !
But I was not alone - this fantastic sequel was a collaboration between KiraQueen (creator of Minimalista) and me! 

And special thanks to the l0bster for the great support!

Edeltraud was so happy. Finally she escaped from the creepy mansion and got home with her bag of sweets. Her life was full of joy. And calories.

But now, one year after the incident in the mansion, the chocolate pudding hits the fan again. Some simpleminded high-school students summoned a ghost. I know what you are thinking: "Oh no - another game with this stupid story". 

Let me explain:
First of all you would be suprised, how often this happens. And this is not an ordinary ghost who kills people for fun. It's the ghost of commercialized halloween, who has done much worse to mankind: He stole all the yummy candies and scattered them around!  So Edeltraud once again put on mum's best bed sheet, to send the insatiable spirit back to the diabetes dimension. Because she's not afraid of no ghost!

Are you Edeltraud enough to collect all candies?

This game features

  • Partly sadistic challenging leveldesign by KiraQueen
  • Re-Used Enhanced graphics by Pixelpoldi
  • Candies! Candies with zero calories! Zero!
  • Realistic light effects. Sort of.
  • A secret passage. You'll love it. If you find it.
